content.text:
# List of banks in the Czech Republic

This is a list of banks in the Czech Republic as of October 2018. The official list is maintained and updated by the Czech National Bank.
Central banks
* Czech National Bank
Commercial and Savings banks
*  (majority owner : PPF through Home Credit)
*
*
* Česká spořitelna (majority owner: Erste Group)
* Československá obchodní banka (ČSOB) (majority owner: KBC Group)
*  (majority owner: KBC Group through ČSOB)
*
*  (majority owner: KBC Group through ČSOB)
*
* Komerční banka (KB) (majority owner: Société Générale)
*  (majority owner: Société Générale through Komerční banka)
*
*
* National Development Bank
* PPF Banka
*  majority owner: Raiffeisen Bank International)
*  (majority owner: Raiffeisen Bank International)
*
*
* UniCredit Bank Czech Republic and Slovakia (majority owner: UniCredit)
* Všeobecná úverová banka (majority owner: Intesa Sanpaolo)
Branches of foreign banks
* Bank Gutmann
* Bank of China (Hungary)
* Bank of Communications
* BNP Paribas Fortis
* BNP Paribas Personal Finance
* Citibank Europe
* Commerzbank
* Deutsche Bank

*
* Saxo Bank

* Živnostenská Banka
